ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We would like to thank Dr. Olga Dudchenko and Dr. Erez Aiden at Baylor College of Medicine for the Hi-C scaffolded Procavia capensis, Trichechus manatus, Orycteropus afer, and Choloepus hoffmannii genomes. We would also like to thank D.H. Vazquez for his indispensable support.
